tool_description: An API shows latest rate between the euro and some others currencies.
title: Euro Currency Rate

api_list.name: Specific Currency
api_list.description: Returns rate between the euro and a specific currency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://euro-currency-rate1.p.rapidapi.com/{valutaid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "euro-currency-rate1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: All currency
api_list.description: Returns rate between the euro and all currencies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://euro-currency-rate1.p.rapidapi.com/euro"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "euro-currency-rate1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
